The image of the church with the name: Lingayath Catholic Church' was shared on social media, along with the text "Estd: April 16, 2018 Bangalore, Karnataka".
The image was also shared by a pro: BJP propaganda website, but was later taken down.
A tweet by: drshraddha16 in 2018 questioned the authenticity of the image, suggesting that it was a misleading representation by missionaries.
Reverse: searching the image led to a blog called 'Beautiful Indian Churches', where it was revealed that the image was actually of a church in Dahanu, Maharashtra, and not in Bangalore as claimed.
